channel.title: Loader Downloader+extractor
channel.description:
I got bored and decided to make getting our loader.jar and client downloading and extracting it easier. I "borrowed" the wget from popcorns deobber. lol :P Threw it together in 5 mins(or less).
Requirements: Windows OS(any), a working RS loader java program(use the banks tut if you don't have one).
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,294949.0.html --- the banks loader tut.
Code inside update.cmd: [code] @echo off del loader.jar del *.class wget http://world160.runescape.com/loader.jar "C:Program FilesJavajdk1.6.0_07injavac.exe" *.java "C:Program FilesJavajdk1.6.0_07injar.exe" xf loader.jar Title Done! echo Done! pause
[/code]
Notice: Don't forget to set your paths if you need to. It deletes all the class files. Tested on vista. The javac is there to recompile your loader.java (and any other ones you need). Some people really are lazy, I'm just trying to help the trend.
[center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] [/center]

item.title: Loader Downloader+extractor
item.dc:creator: @maggot525 maggot525
item.description:
@maggot525 wrote:

I got bored and decided to make getting our loader.jar and client downloading and extracting it easier. I “borrowed” the wget from popcorns deobber. lol
Threw it together in 5 mins(or less).

Requirements: Windows OS(any), a working RS loader java program(use the banks tut if you don’t have one).

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,294949.0.html — the banks loader tut.

Code inside update.cmd:

@echo off
del loader.jar
del *.class
wget http://world160.runescape.com/loader.jar
"C:Program FilesJavajdk1.6.0_07injavac.exe" *.java
"C:Program FilesJavajdk1.6.0_07injar.exe" xf loader.jar
Title Done!
echo Done!
pause

Notice:
Don’t forget to set your paths if you need to. It deletes all the class files. Tested on vista. The javac is there to recompile your loader.java (and any other ones you need). Some people really are lazy, I’m just trying to help the trend.

[center] [/center]

Read full topic
